pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, November 18, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Washington, D.C., United States of America

Private meetings.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Mexico, Andrés Manuel López Obrador.

Mexican Cultural Institute of Washington, D.C.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden.

Oval Office, West Wing, First Floor
White House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Vice President of the United States of America, Kamala Harris.

Office of the Vice President, Eisenhower Executive Office Building
White House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden, and the President of Mexico, Andrés Manuel López Obrador, for the North American Leaders’ Summit (NALS).

East Ballroom, Official Residence
White House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Embassy of Canada to the United States

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
